pages.text: The Stone of the Sea grants its wearer the ability to breathe underwater, and changes swimming controls to a method more closely resembling 1.13+ swimming mechanics.

$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)$(2)+400%$() Swim Speed$(br2)$(l)Mod Compatibility:$()$(br)$(n)Tough as Nails$() / $(n)Simple Difficulty$(): Immunity to thirst status effect$(br)$(n)Enhanced Visuals$(): Removes the blur visual effect for entering water
